msbt.message: Thanks for participating in the Bug-Off! You scored at least 100 points, so I've included your prize! Think of it as a pupa for you to begin your metamorphosis with!
Thanks for participating in the Bug-Off! You scored at least 200 points, so I've included your prize! You have traveled far on the road toward their thoraxy realm!
Thanks for participating in the Bug-Off! You scored at least 300 points, so I've included your prize! Your journey toward True Infestation is almost complete!
